text: Nesting modules is not currently a planned feature. We are looking to solve the underlying problems that nested modules would be used to solve though through other means. Stay tuned to the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|developer changelog> where we announce developer facing changes. Some iterative steps towards addressing the underlying issues coming soon.
I was wondering if there was a way to alter the default module options. I'll clone and adjust them instead. Thank you!
